  2. Agnese I. Curatolo*, Nan Zhou*, Yongfeng Zhao*, Chenli Liu, Adrian Daerr, Julien Tailleur, Jian-Dong Huang, "Cooperative pattern formation in multi-species bacterial colonies".
    3. Preprint

    4. Preprint, Phys. Rev. Lett.
  4. Thibault Bertrand, Yongfeng Zhao, Olivier Bénichou, Julien Tailleur, Raphaël Voituriez, “Optimized Diffusion of Run-and-Tumble Particles in Crowded Environments”, Phys. Rev. Lett. 120, 198103 (2018).
    5. Preprint, Phys. Rev. Lett.
